member.name: F:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.dropDownListBox
member.summary: The ListBox used for all drop-down lists.

member.name: F:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.filters
member.summary: A list of filters available for the owning column stored as formatted and unformatted string values.

member.name: F:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.selectedFilterValue
member.summary: The drop-down list filter value currently in effect for the owning column.

member.name: F:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.currentColumnFilter
member.summary: The complete filter string currently in effect for the owning column.

member.name: F:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.filtered
member.summary: Indicates whether the DataGridView is currently filtered by the owning column.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell class and sets its property values to the property values of the specified DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.
member.param: The DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell to copy property values from.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell class.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
member.returns: An object that represents the cloned DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.OnDataGridViewChanged
member.summary: Called when the value of the DataGridView property changes in order to perform initialization that requires access to the owning control and column.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.VerifyDataSource
member.summary: Confirms that the data source, if it has been set, is a BindingSource.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.HandleDataGridViewEvents
member.summary: Add handlers to various DataGridView events, primarily to invalidate the drop-down button bounds, hide the drop-down list, and reset cached filter values when changes in the DataGridView require it.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.DataGridView_Scroll(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs)
member.summary: Invalidates the drop-down button bounds when the user scrolls horizontally.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
A ScrollEventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.DataGridView_ColumnDisplayIndexChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnEventArgs)
member.summary: Invalidates the drop-down button bounds when the column display index changes.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.DataGridView_ColumnWidthChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnEventArgs)
member.summary: Invalidates the drop-down button bounds when a column width changes in the DataGridView control. A width change in any column of the control has the potential to affect the drop-down button location, depending on the current horizontal scrolling position and whether the changed column is to the left or right of the current column. It is easier to invalidate the button in all cases.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
A DataGridViewColumnEventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.DataGridView_ColumnHeadersHeightChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Invalidates the drop-down button bounds when the height of the column headers changes.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
An EventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.DataGridView_SizeChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Invalidates the drop-down button bounds when the size of the DataGridView changes. This prevents a painting issue that occurs when the right edge of the control moves to the right and the control contents have previously been scrolled to the right.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
An EventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.DataGridView_DataBindingComplete(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBindingCompleteEventArgs)
member.summary: Invalidates the drop-down button bounds, hides the drop-down filter list, if it is showing, and resets the cached filter values if the filter has been removed.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
A DataGridViewBindingCompleteEventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.DataGridView_DataSourceChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Verifies that the data source meets requirements, invalidates the drop-down button bounds, hides the drop-down filter list if it is showing, and resets the cached filter values if the filter has been removed.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
An EventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.ResetDropDown
member.summary: Invalidates the drop-down button bounds and hides the filter list if it is showing.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.ResetFilter
member.summary: Resets the cached filter values if the filter has been removed.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.DataGridView_ColumnSortModeChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnEventArgs)
member.summary: Throws an exception when the column sort mode is changed to Automatic.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
A DataGridViewColumnEventArgs that contains the event data.

member.summary: Paints the column header cell, including the drop-down button.
member.param: The Graphics used to paint the DataGridViewCell.
A Rectangle that represents the area of the DataGridView that needs to be repainted.
A Rectangle that contains the bounds of the DataGridViewCell that is being painted.
The row index of the cell that is being painted.
A bitwise combination of DataGridViewElementStates values that specifies the state of the cell.
The data of the DataGridViewCell that is being painted.
The formatted data of the DataGridViewCell that is being painted.
An error message that is associated with the cell.
A DataGridViewCellStyle that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
A DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
A bitwise combination of the DataGridViewPaintParts values that specifies which parts of the cell need to be painted.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles mouse clicks to the header cell, displaying the drop-down list or sorting the owning column as appropriate.
member.param: A DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.SortByColumn
member.summary: Sorts the DataGridView by the current column if AutomaticSortingEnabled is true.

member.name: F:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.dropDownListBoxShowing
member.summary: Indicates whether dropDownListBox is currently displayed for this header cell.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.ShowDropDownList
member.summary: Displays the drop-down filter list.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.HideDropDownList
member.summary: Hides the drop-down filter list.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.SetDropDownListBoxBounds
member.summary: Sets the dropDownListBox size and position based on the formatted values in the filters dictionary and the position of the drop-down button. Called only by ShowDropDownListBox.

member.name: P:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.DropDownListBoxMaxHeightInternal
member.summary: Gets the actual maximum height of the drop-down list, in pixels. The maximum height is calculated from the DropDownListBoxMaxLines property value, but is limited to the available height of the DataGridView control.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.HandleDropDownListBoxEvents
member.summary: Adds handlers to ListBox events for handling mouse and keyboard input.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.UnhandleDropDownListBoxEvents
member.summary: Removes the ListBox event handlers.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.DropDownListBox_MouseClick(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Adjusts the filter in response to a user selection from the drop-down list.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
A MouseEventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: F:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.lostFocusOnDropDownButtonClick
member.summary: Indicates whether the drop-down list lost focus because the user clicked the drop-down button.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.DropDownListBox_LostFocus(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Hides the drop-down list when it loses focus.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
An EventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.DropDownListBox_KeyDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the ENTER and ESC keys.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
A KeyEventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.PopulateFilters
member.summary: Populates the filters dictionary with formatted and unformatted string representations of each unique value in the column, accounting for all filters except the current column's. Also adds special filter options.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.FilterWithoutCurrentColumn(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a copy of the specified filter string after removing the part that filters the current column, if present.
member.param: The filter string to parse.
member.returns: A copy of the specified filter string without the current column's filter.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.UpdateFilter
member.summary: Updates the BindingSource.Filter value based on a user selection from the drop-down filter list.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.RemoveFilter(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView)
member.summary: Removes the filter from the BindingSource bound to the specified DataGridView.
member.param: The DataGridView bound to the BindingSource to unfilter.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.GetFilterStatus(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView)
member.summary: Gets a status string for the specified DataGridView indicating the number of visible rows in the bound, filtered BindingSource, or String.Empty if all rows are currently visible.
member.param: The DataGridView bound to the BindingSource to return the filter status for.
member.returns: A string in the format "x of y records found" where x is the number of rows currently displayed and y is the number of rows available, or String.Empty if all rows are currently displayed.

member.name: F:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.dropDownButtonBoundsValue
member.summary: The bounds of the drop-down button, or Rectangle.Empty if filtering is disabled or the button bounds need to be recalculated.

member.name: P:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.DropDownButtonBounds
member.summary: The bounds of the drop-down button, or Rectangle.Empty if filtering is disabled. Recalculates the button bounds if filtering is enabled and the bounds are empty.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.InvalidateDropDownButtonBounds
member.summary: Sets dropDownButtonBoundsValue to Rectangle.Empty if it isn't already empty. This indicates that the button bounds should be recalculated.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.SetDropDownButtonBounds
member.summary: Sets the position and size of dropDownButtonBoundsValue based on the current cell bounds and the preferred cell height for a single line of header text.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.AdjustPadding(System.Int32)
member.summary: Adjusts the cell padding to widen the header by the drop-down button width.
member.param: The new drop-down button width.

member.name: F:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.currentDropDownButtonPaddingOffset
member.summary: The current width of the drop-down button. This field is used to adjust the cell padding.

member.name: F:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.filteringEnabledValue
member.summary: Indicates whether filtering is enabled for the owning column.

member.name: P:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.FilteringEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether filtering is enabled.

member.name: F:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.automaticSortingEnabledValue
member.summary: Indicates whether automatic sorting is enabled.

member.name: P:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.AutomaticSortingEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether automatic sorting is enabled for the owning column.

member.name: F:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.dropDownListBoxMaxLinesValue
member.summary: The maximum number of lines in the drop-down list.

member.name: P:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.DropDownListBoxMaxLines
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of lines to display in the drop-down filter list. The actual height of the drop-down list is constrained by the DataGridView height.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.FilterListBox.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FilterListBox class.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.FilterListBox.IsInputKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Indicates that the FilterListBox will handle (or ignore) all keystrokes that are not handled by the operating system.
member.param: A Keys value that represents the keyboard input.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.FilterListBox.ProcessKeyMessage(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)
member.summary: Processes a keyboard message directly, preventing it from being intercepted by the parent DataGridView control.
member.param: A Message, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
member.returns: true if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell.FilterListBox
member.summary: Represents a ListBox control used as a drop-down filter list in a DataGridView control.

member.name: T:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterColumnHeaderCell
member.summary: Provides a drop-down filter list in a DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterTextBoxColumn.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DataGridViewAutoFilterTextBoxColumn class.

member.name: P:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterTextBoxColumn.DefaultHeaderCellType
member.summary: Returns the AutoFilter header cell type. This property hides the non-virtual DefaultHeaderCellType property inherited from the DataGridViewBand class. The inherited property is set in the DataGridViewAutoFilterTextBoxColumn constructor.

member.name: P:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterTextBoxColumn.SortMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the sort mode for the column and prevents it from being set to Automatic, which would interfere with the proper functioning of the drop-down button. This property hides the non-virtual DataGridViewColumn.SortMode property from the designer. The inherited property is set in the DataGridViewAutoFilterTextBoxColumn constructor.

member.name: P:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterTextBoxColumn.FilteringEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether filtering is enabled for this column.

member.name: P:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterTextBoxColumn.AutomaticSortingEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether automatic sorting is enabled for this column.

member.name: P:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterTextBoxColumn.DropDownListBoxMaxLines
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum height of the drop-down filter list for this column.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterTextBoxColumn.RemoveFilter(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView)
member.summary: Removes the filter from the BindingSource bound to the specified DataGridView.
member.param: The DataGridView bound to the BindingSource to unfilter.

member.name: M:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterTextBoxColumn.GetFilterStatus(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView)
member.summary: Gets a status string for the specified DataGridView indicating the number of visible rows in the bound, filtered BindingSource, or String.Empty if all rows are currently visible.
member.param: The DataGridView bound to the BindingSource to return the filter status for.
member.returns: A string in the format "x of y records found" where x is the number of rows currently displayed and y is the number of rows available, or String.Empty if all rows are currently displayed.

member.name: T:DataGridViewAutoFilter.DataGridViewAutoFilterTextBoxColumn
member.summary: Represents a DataGridViewTextBoxColumn with a drop-down filter list accessible from the header cell.
